name: photonuclear
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to or caused by high-energy photons (= single units of light) coming into contact with the nucleus (= central part) of an atom: Studies suggest that the number of photonuclear reactions is closely related to the laser intensity and irradiation time. Photonuclear experiments were performed using high-peak power lasers.
More examplesFewer examplesMuons can be produced in the atmosphere by photonuclear interactions.Photonuclear reaction induced by ultra-intense laser was first proposed by Shkolnikov et al.We are evaluating additional photonuclear techniques, for example, photofission.
